title: Wild craft
details: Men’s essential shoes for men can be classified as footwear that should be a part of every wardrobe. Some of them include casual sneakers, oxfords, derbys, loafers, kolhapuris, slip-ons, etc. The major reason behind the popularity of these shoes for men is that they are essentially timeless.
